system.description:
This spell affects an area of water the size of a Large Burst Template, allowing you to either raise or lower the water level by up to 1" (i.e., 2 yards) per caster rank. Raising the water level creates a water hill, with water spilling over the sides. Lowering the water level creates a depression, which becomes a whirlpool in particularly large and deep bodies of water.
 If this spell is cast directly on a water elemental, it may attempt to resist with an opposed Spirit roll: on a failure its Pace is halved and movement becomes a normal action.
system.rank: Seasoned (Priest, Shaman and Water Sphere) or Veteran (Mage)
system.duration: 30 minutes per caster rank, dismiss early as a normal action
